Language_en_US.text: The sea is as clear as a mirror.
Slight ripples are visible in the sea.
A light breeze causes the sails to rustle.
A moderate breeze is revealing whitecaps.
A fresh wind is blowing through the sails.
You can hear a howling whistle in the strong wind.
Streaks of white foam appear in the stormy wind.
The waves in the storm make your ship rock back and forth.
A blinding spray drives in the raging storm.
A storm is raging. Your ship barely holds its fury.
The sea is heaving in mountainous waves from the blasting hurricane.
You are in the most terrible hurricane ever to come out of the heavens.
